text: I only get delivery from here but they have never screwed up my order and the Food quality is outstanding .  Great fries!.

Nice after work spot friendly mixed crowd. Wings were flavorful and cooked well. Polish boy one of the best in town bun was hearty polish sausage full of flavor and skin was crisp perfection french fries  were real fresh cuts. Drinks are reasonably priced and flowed continually.
I been here a few time and have been really happy with all my meals. Burgers, mussels and a BLT were all exceptional! Not a fancy place at all but comfortable.
